example[0]: The wrapping machine was pre-set to wrap a given number of biscuits.
example[1]: Candidates will have to give a presentation on a given topic.
example[2]: a game in which, at a given signal, everyone has to stand still
example[3]: Given the circumstances, you’ve done really well.
example[4]: Given that the patients have some disabilities, we still try to enable them to be as independent as possible.
definition[3]: a basic fact that you accept as being true
example[5]: Sandra will be at least 15 minutes late – that’s a given.
example[6]: The concept is taken as a given in social studies.
